sections.content:
Question:
What is the difference between RA4T1 and RA6T3?
Answer:
RA4T1 and RA6T3 are new motor control MCUs in the RA4 and RA6 series.
RA4T1 and RA6T3 differ in maximum operating frequency, Code Flash option, and USB support, but are basically pin and peripheral function compatible, migration between products is very easy.
Suitable Products
RA4T1, RA6T3
